page.title: 07HANDSPINNING IN PORCHFIELD.
page.content: My interests are crochet, dressmaking, painting, knitting by machine and spinning.My new spinning chair was made in Porchfield by a craftsman, also my Niddy Noddy, bobbins and drop spindles.I use the fleece of the rare Manx Loughton sheep which is a light brown and gold.I also use Jacob fleece,dog's hair etc.I use natural vegetation for dyeing fleece various colours.When the wool has been spun the yarn is used for knitting jumpers, weaving of rugs and felting.I also use the drop spindle which once was the only means of spinning yarn.Nowadays the spinning wheel can be replaced with an electric motor.My Husband has made an electric spinner for me.
